name: OS Credential Dumping
desc: Adversaries may attempt to dump credentials from the operating system, e.g., LSASS memory on Windows.
detection: Monitor access to lsass.exe handles (Sysmon Event ID 10), suspicious use of procdump, comsvcs.dll.

name: Brute Force
desc: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to guess credentials.
detection: Look for multiple authentication failures followed by a success from the same source IP or user.

name: Domain Generation Algorithms
desc: Malware may use DGA to generate domain names for C2.
detection: High volume of DNS queries to random-looking domains with low TTLs.
